about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in a story set in a distant and dark future, where the line between human and machine has long been erased, and corporations rule nations. By a twist of fate, the main character crossed paths with his former patrons, lost his family, and became a mechanical semblance of a human - a Limbonaut - driven by a thirst for revenge.

Features:

  • Gripping storyline in an alternate history and cyberpunk setting

  • A variety of weapons - from broken pipes and firearms to high-tech melee and energy weapons

  • Challenging levels and platforming that test your skills

    On this page, a demo version is presented where you can familiarize yourself with the combat system, the terminal system, basic enemies, and the boss from the first chapter of the full release version of the game, along with the general direction of the visual and audio styles.

content_descriptors.notes: The game features scenes of violence and cruelty and murder. The setting is dark and moody, but unrealistic.
